title: Riddick 2013 NEW SOURCE CAM XViD - JUSTiCE
description:

http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1411250/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1411250/</a>



Left for dead on a sun-scorched planet, Riddick finds himself up against an alien race of predators. Activating an emergency beacon alerts two ships: one carrying a new breed of mercenary, the other captained by a man from Riddick's past. 



Director:
 David Twohy 

Writers:
 David Twohy, Jim Wheat (based on characters created by)

Stars:
 Vin Diesel, Karl Urban, Katee Sackhoff 

Genres:
  Action |  Sci-Fi |  Thriller 

Country:
 USA | UK 

Language:
 English 



Riddick 2013 NEW SOURCE CAM XViD - JUSTiCE



 SOURCE : VIDEO - blacktops/high THXS   AUDIO - blacktops/high THXS


 Video and audio both cleaned and given justice.
 Check sample and see.....


 Alot better than the last source and seems complete,more level and less cropped.
 Still needed some TLC and video also had logo in bottom right corner.
 Audio is like blacktops other releases ...the right channel is over powering and of course as the normal cam audio issues...but still decent for what
 it is.


 WORKDONE -

 Right don't have access to the blacktop video so had to use highs release ...first thing was to reblur their blur as they left a small amount whic caused a thin
 white line going up the screen.
 Also then i changed the rgb colours,sat,brightness,contrast levels....aswell as using a HQ smoother and some sharpness.

 Audio stripped and dropped in AA ....remastered both channels before remuxing to out rip.

 Overall v -6/7 a 6 m 6 ...of course IMHO.
